304a1(rgyud): / zhes thams cad 'byung bar bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gas la stong gzugs// khyab gsal rang bzhin 'gro ba'i sgra// dang bas sem byed kyi phyi/ 
304a2(rgyud): don bcu nyams su myong ba'i ro// bde mchog don la reg pa nyid// ces yon tan dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ci yang mi sems gti mug la// dngos po kun bcom zhe sdang nyid// ye 'byam
304a3(rgyud): rgyal bdag nyid me// bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa// gang du ma 'gyur gzhan phrag dog/ ces blang dor med par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ kun gyi dang bzhin gcig shes pas// de nyid
304a4(rgyud): duthams cad 'dus// kun la dbang sgyur thos pas na// yi dbang chen po rdzogs pa'o// zhes dbang dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ thams cad kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo// kun la khyab gnas
304a5(rgyud): rtag dka' ba// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul yin// rdo kun bkod rnal 'byor lung // zhes bka' dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid der ni kun gcig pas// bdag dang gzhan dus
304a6(rgyud): bamed// spyong nyid rnam dag nam mkha' la// gtsang smer dbye ba rdul yang med// ces bdud rtsi dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ byang chub snying po dang bal// rnam rtog rdul gyis gal / 
304a7(rgyud): / chen por 'bru chud pas// ces kyang mi bskyod nyam ming // zhes re dogs med par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ rnam rtog mtshan ma'i ri bo 'di// seng ge'i log par 'azhig ltar// stong nyidar
304a8(rgyud): dgan// gzhan gyis 'jigs par gal 'gyur// zhes rang bzhin dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ bdi tshan rnam dag tog byed pas// lags nyes gnyis ka rnam par rtog/ bde chen nges
304b1(rgyud): ts+tsha gas na// gang de rnam pa ga pa med// ces yongs su rtog pasas 'das par bsngags so// ma la ne 'di na dang / de nyid byin mam chog par// khasrung bya mi rtog mi gnas pa// ma mag
304b2(rgyud): da nin de las 'dang mi bya// zhes dam cha ga dam par bsngags so// lal ni 'di skad du/ dpag tu me pa'i deg rten du// sgron ma thas ma gyis mi khyab pas// ji nyed pa'i chos bskun pa// mtha' yas don ma
304b3(rgyud): dul// zhes par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid de las mnyams na// dran pasam snu ma med pa yi// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab nyid// bslab pa rnam gsum yongs su rdzogs// shes
304b4(rgyud): bslab pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid las mthal ni gnas dang // lhag pa'i don mthong 'dres pa 'i// sde gsum nges par rdzogs pa na// 'bum phrag mtha' yas brjod mi lang // zhes ba
304b5(rgyud): / brgyad pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ tshig la dbang bas tshig bsgyur na// tshig mtha' yas pas bsdus na 'dus// tshig gcig rnam par spros gyur na// brjod pas de ni zad mi 'gyur// 
304b6(rgyud): lung mi zad pa dam par bsngags so// la lan 'od skad du/ smra brjod tshig la gang dag pas// gang gis dgongs pa dpog mi nus// tshig tshogs rgya mtsho thos pa min// tshig gcig thos pa thos pa'i
304b7(rgyud): sa thos pa rgya mtsho'i dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ khyab dang mi gnas rnapa mi rtog/ ma thal mig yo ma chags pa// de nyid las ni gzhan med de// pha rol phyin pa de khon// zhes mthar son pa
304b8(rgyud): gas so// na dis dang / 'dan do sa/ dmal yon pa tshad lca phra/ ngam gyis kyangs ma tha das/ mi dzin dza ga pas stod
305a1(rgyud): // bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ mtshan par byas dang snga ba'i mchog/ ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yi// mkha' da la 'gyur nam reg pa// bathob tha mad byang chub nyid// ces bsngo ba das
305a2(rgyud): sngags so// kha la ni 'di ga dang / chos gang sems kyi sbyi / gnyis dpas 'du k+Sha ba// mdza 'khrul pas sbyin ma/ chen gas nga lags sa ma las log/ tsas gdams dgadam pa
305a3(rgyud): rkyen rten 'brel rim gyis pa// blo chung rmongs pas khrid pa'i thabs// ma btsas de bzhin nyid 'dil// rten 'brel rgyu 'bras rim gyes med// ces nges par dam par bsnga
305a4(rgyud): so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ma btsas de dzi zhin nyid 'di la// yid bzhin cir yang srung ba yi// tshe 'phrul 'byung bas sems can rnams// ji ltar 'dul ba mthong thos snang // zhes thams cad rgyu med pa la bsngags
305a5(rgyud): la la ni 'di skad du/ zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// gsang ba'i dbyings na gnas pa yi// thams cad gsang ba'i snying po nyid// mthong bas 'gro don rgya mtshor rdzogs// shes thams cad ldan gyis grub par bsdu
305a6(rgyud): so// la lan 'di skad du/ dngos pa med pa ba nyid// mngang ba nyid mi dmigs// dran med kyad byed med pa// gnas gsum mnyam nyid rjes su ngan// zhes ting nge 'dzin dam par bsngags so// la
305a7(rgyud): smad du/ gnas gsum dmigs pa'i 'du shes med// ming med tshig gi lam dang bral// bla med 'dus ma byas pa yi// mchogapa yang dag mchog tu bshad// ces mchod pa dam par bsngags so// 2
305a8(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba dpag med du// lag cing shin pa'i mun pa gsupa//  byed sul bzhin gad cigs// kun gsal gcig gis yongs sus ngas// shes gsang bdam par bsdigs so// 2
305b1(rgyud): despyang du/ mun pas 'thabs pa de dag gas// m-igar matog da bstsu// da sod ldan pa rnam dgas nga // 'tshad sangs kun gyi mchog ta 'ashad// tsas tshangs padam par bsngags sa// lal ni 'di skang du/ mi
305b2(rgyud): na med dmigs pas// stong pa nyid kyichos nyid pa// gnas pa gang men de dag gis// gnyen po bstan duH pa meng // tsas la cad pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ thams cad dang bananam
305b3(rgyud): ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin du// rang rig bla na med pa yi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o// zhes sems bskyed pa rnam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ci yang mi sems mi g.yo zhing // mi
305b4(rgyud): bar mi g.yengs/ kun la khyab par bdal bI dpyi kun shod kya med cig chen mchog/ ces theg pa chen po'i gas padam par bsngags so// lal na 'di skad du/ theg chen gas ba'i snying po 'ad// da
305b5(rgyud): dmigs mtha' las 'das// gang 'dir dbu ma 'dod pa dag/ mtha' las 'das par gal 'gyur// zhes dbus mthar mi dmigs par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang / 
305b6(rgyud): thong sems can sems mi mthong // sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba// de'i don dam yang dag mthong // zhes mthong ba yongs su bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin pa// mi
305b7(rgyud): gnas ldanas / sa byab dbyung ba/ rnas pa ga// nas ma pagrang 'das pa bal gas so// lel du/  dgag su// dab 'i rnamams
305b8(rgyud): de lam gtogs ga shig na// sangs rgyas bya ba gal med// ces le nas sangs rgyas par bsngags so// le la ni di ska dang/ brtan ga sa dkyil 'khor phyag kyi rdzogs// tog 'angan skam
306a1(rgyud): / 'dzin sngags// med byurgyags chags mngon pa'i tshig/ bsgyu 'gru' ba ltas snang bras bu'o// zhes gsang lpags dam pa'i tshig go// grogs po dag de ltar ni de bzhin gshags pa thams cad
306a2(rgyud): kyi dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid las 'di skad du/ thams cad thams cad ji snyed pa// tshig gi tha snyad tsam dag las// 'di la bya ba ci yang med// rang bzhin de nyid ya sangs rgyas// a ho zhes de bzhin gshegs
306a3(rgyud): pathams cad las 'das te bde 'i chen po lhun dang bar gyur to// de nas gas pa'i bdag pa nyid kyis chags su 'acad de smras pa/ dper na kun tu rgya 'i mi// 'dod pa'i yul dug 'gro ba// yul gyi rnamapa
306a4(rgyud): sha yas kyang // bgrod yul lam gnas gcig las med// de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rnam grangs chos sgo ji snyed kyang // bkri bas drang ba'i tshig yin te// bsam pa'i yul
306a5(rgyud): don rnams gcig tu bsdus pa yi// bslab par bya ba dam pas// nges par gcig las med pa'i phyir// kun 'dus dam pa'i bslab par gces// dam pa'i dang 'dus kun shes na// de ma ye shes
306a6(rgyud): las te// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid pas// ma don gcig tu bsdus par gsungs// grogs podag de dag ni de 'din gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa de can nyid gcig tu 'dus par de bzhin
306a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dus nas bshad pa ste/ thams cad kyi mdod khon nyid du 'dus par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa rnams gcig/ nges pa dam parnyed par gyur te// des
306a8(rgyud): po nyid la dman pa rnams yi rangs te/ mngon par bstod pa/ a ma hi stes chen gsang ba'i bdag// rtsal chen slab seng ge'i sgra// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// sangs
306b1(rgyud): gakun dngos ye nas byung // khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mes// che mchog rje can dam pa' sra// bdag shegs kun gyis nye chog/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun kya dngas// kun gyi 'byu ga
306b2(rgyud): / longagasal// phyogs kun gsal 'grel nges pa'i mdo// theg chen rmang grags ngo mtshar che// gas pa chen bung tshul ngo mtsha// a haM zhes nges pa dam par mngon par bstod/ de nas cang mi dmigs pa
306b3(rgyud): kang du nges par 'gros pa'i gsang padam pa dag lha dang me'i 'jig rten du mcher grags sher yongs su grags par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sangs
306b4(rgyud): nagyi dgengs pa 'dus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun nu lnga pa'o// / theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gi dgongs pa rnam par bkros pa na yang byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi
306b5(rgyud): ye shes rnam par 'gros pa ste/ byang tshul bstan pa'i bcu gnyis pa'i ba ma'o// // sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdothug pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chos thams cad kyi me long/ 
306b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'grel ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgangs pa dam pa gsang ba/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes drag/ shul can gyi rim la ya'i cher lang ka'i bdag po la sogs
306b7(rgyud): dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la rgya cher yongs su bgros pa/ rgya gar gyi ma/ ra po ng+ga d+hidang / ring lugs can pad na rak+Sha ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa 'che btsan sras kyis bru sha'i yaM ge las
306b8(rgyud): kye khrom du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// bka' 'di la da'an pas su bla tshul bcu gnyis pa/ le'u bdun du rtsa lnga pa/ bam po bcu dang / shu lo gnyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// 
307a1(rgyud): / rbaprak+sha te nAn d+he Sh+TAn ta thA ga to d+ya ba dang / te ShAny+tsa yo na ro d+ha ma pa pA dI ma hA shra maNaH/ sangs rgyas dgangs 'dus rnyed ma'i chos// chog dod dga' zhing sdebaskor kyang // nor 'jol rigs rna
307a2(rgyud): skams macos// da ni shin tu dag par bzhugs// / nA gar sla du/ sarba ta thA ga ta ku h+ya ma hA ku b+ha ko Sha ma k+Sha yan dI dI ba ma hA prata sA d+han tan+ta dAn shAr+ya r+ya te tsa kr-i na ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ da rna
307a3(rgyud): zhin gshegs pa thams cad ci gsang ba/ gsang ba'i mdzod chen po mi za pa gter gyi sgron ma/ yul zhugs chen po bsgrub pa'i rgyad/ ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'ag pa
307a4(rgyud): mdo// bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// mi skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsapa mchog gi bdag po dpal kun tu 'artsa
307a5(rgyud): na po ye shes rngam pa'i hrul po zhes bya ba phyogs bcu dang dus pa nas bsdus pa'i 'dabar gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid chen
307a6(rgyud): // gas ba mchog nyidagyes pa na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i longs spyod chen po// chos ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyi rang 'dzin chen po// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen
307a7(rgyud): bdag nyid de 'og min gyi gnas mtha' da dbus brjod du med pa na pang zhin ldan sa grub pa'i gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba yus kyu mkha' rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas kha na ga
307a8(rgyud): dngam kyis byigs par yongs sa / mams cid nyim sa me pa'i shings su mi ma gas papa/ smras pa ma dul gyis kyang gi skye
307b1(rgyud): glar ba/ dbyings dang ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'i thabs las byung ba'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ bsod nams dang ye shes
307b2(rgyud): thugs rje rgyas pa'i phyir gru 'ani rigasal ba/ rnam pa sar pa'i smonas 'jug pa'i sgo bzhin rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi lam stegs bu shar ba/ phyi dang nang med par lhun gyis thub pa'i gzhal yas khang den nyim
307b3(rgyud): na rangs pa dang phyed kyi sa 'od gsal bar snang ba dang / che ba'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang mu tig gi chun mdzes 'phyang ba dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / bla re dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs
307b4(rgyud): rgyan gyi kyang par dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ta li'i ljon shing dang / reb bskor ba'i dpag bsam kyi shing dang / yid bzhin gyi nor du rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / 'jig rten pa'i lha dang / lha'i bu mo rnam pa sna tshogs
307b5(rgyud): rol mo dang gla dbyangs kyi tshigs su bcad pas brgyan pa'i gnas khyad par myur na po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i gnas de nyid na thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i nyi zla dang ma chags ma
307b6(rgyud): pa'i pad ma dang mi zad pa'i rin po cher bar ba'i gdan khri dang 'chims cha dang sdom rten du ldan par gnas so// gzhan yang thag 'thung gi tshogs 'dus pa'i gnas su yang sbyar te/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyi
307b7(rgyud): yang kyi tha brag ning gi gdan dang sbal nag gi chus byang nga sod pa rnam gsum gyi mtshan me dang / rlung nag gi zung ba spangs shing ngagata'i mya mtshami bzad par 'khrugs pa dang / mchis de dag tu 'khyil gyi
307b8(rgyud): 'bar ba/ keng dus kyir rab las ra ka ta'i khrag zhag gi ru 'bab pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phro 'a mang po 'khrug pa'i gnas na dregs pa khro shug dang / sems can chen po'i gdan dang bcas pa'i gnas kun
308a1(rgyud): da sa shas mchogs las gru pa/ ma na gyi bang d+hAg can nga gas ci'i gral du kyang ba na rnal 'byar gyi dbang phyug gal ma tshogs brjod pa las da
308a2(rgyud): yang brjod pa las 'das pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed lathod pa ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / khrag 'thung rol pa'i tshogs dang / dad pas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams da
308a3(rgyud): gcig tu zhugs pa'i'adi lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tsun mdang bcas pas bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mang dang / de bzhin gshegs
308a4(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa na chen 'byung ldan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sdang ba mtha' yas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang / btsun mo dam pa dbyings phyag ma dang / btsun
308a5(rgyud): dam pa sangs rgyas spyan dang / btsun me dam pa mA ma kI dang / btsun mo dam panas dkar mo dang / btsun mo dam pa sgrol ma dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi rnal 'byor gyi 'khor bcun mi'i tshogs pa
308a6(rgyud): bcas pa nam mkha' ding mnyam pa rnal 'byor chen po sems dpa' rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor chen porin chen rdo dang / rnal 'bye ba chen po chos rdo dang / rnal 'byor chen po las rdo dang / rnal
308a7(rgyud): rdorje sems ma dang / rnal 'byor chen mngon chen sems ma dang / rnal 'byor chen mo chos kyi sems ma dang / rnal 'byor chen mo las kyi sems ma dang / gzhan yang nam mkha' dang mnyam
308a8(rgyud): 'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa byang chub chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chab chen po nam mkha'i sring po dang / byang chub chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang
308b1(rgyud): chen po la gan rdo rje dang / byang chub chen po 'jam dpal gzhan nu dang / byang chub chen po sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub chen po byams pa ma tri dang / byang chub chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub chen po
308b2(rgyud): modang / byang chung cini ma phrang bdang / byang sa chen po dbyangs dang / byang chub ca ma gas sa dang / byang chub can mchog mim dang / byang ru bachen ma matog sa dang / byang dub na mo mang ma me dang / 
308b3(rgyud): / dridrang / gzhan yang 'joms pa chen po'i 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa 'joms pa chen po ga shin rje gshed po dang / 'joms pa chen po stobs po che dang / 'joms
308b4(rgyud): na po rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'joms pa chen po rta'i rgyal po dang / 'joms pa chen po bdud rtsi thab spyod dang / 'joms mtshan mo lcags kyu ma dang / 'joms ma chen mo zhags pa ma dang / 'jo
308b5(rgyud): pa chen mo lcags sgrog ma dang / 'joms ma chen mo 'bebs ma dang / gzhan yang thub pa'i sras kyi 'khor rdul phrar bskyed dang mnyam pa/ thub pa chen po lha'i dbang po dang / thub pa chen po lham
308b6(rgyud): dbang po dang / lung chen gyi ma'i dbang po dang / thub pa chen podu 'argya'i dbang pa dang / brab chen po yi dgas kyi dbang po dang / thub pa chen pa dmyal ba'i dbang po dang / de dag la sogs pa rnal
308b7(rgyud): dang thag chen po sras kyi tshogs grangs med pa dang / yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// gzhan sa sa k+ku la la pa'i 'dul zhes ga tsun pa mchags dburgyas pa 'di ste/ laga'
308b8(rgyud): dpal ba ru/ zhes bya ba dang / khrag zung chen pa dpal ba sra ga nas bya ba dang / zas mang chen ci la ma che gzhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thub chen po dpal ga nas byab
309a1(rgyud): // bags rgya chen ba dpal gaHte drag zhes bya ba dang / bdun sa prar+d+ha kr-i d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun ma marbab d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun pa na nas bya ba dang / bdun mo bad+man b+hanas tha2
309a2(rgyud): btsun mo gad+ha kr-i d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gsang pa chen po lakhor btsun mdang bcas pa gsang 'a chen po ra h+ye ru ga nas b+hA ba dang / gas par zin po yak+Sha hi ru ga zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen po
309a3(rgyud): gsang ba chen pos ma ya he ru ga zhes bya ba dang / gas pa chen mo rAk+Sha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen ma ya// krod+hi shes bya ba dang / gsang 'chen ma bai shwa kro b+he nas
309a4(rgyud): gas ba chen mo sa ma ya kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang 'phra men ma nyi shu'i tshogs kyi 'khor dkar mo'i tshogs shes bya ba dang / rkun mo'i tshogs shes bya ba dang / spos mo'i tshogs shes
309a5(rgyud): ba dang / gtum mo'i tshogs shes bya ba dang / rmongs pa'i tshogs shes bya ba dang / bal byed ma'i tshogs shes bya ba dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs shes bya ba dang / mtshogs shes bya ba dang / seng gang

309a8(rgyud): chags shes bya ba dang / seng gdang gatshogs shes bye ba dang / sdug dang gatshogs shes bya ba da la sogs pa 'braman ma'i tshogs shin tu mang ba dang / gzhan yang rdorje phrin pa khran pa tshogs de
309b1(rgyud): yon ma parnam par rgyal 'anas bya ba dang / dbugs ca pa nas bya ba dang / ga she/  rjeg shed ces bya ba dang / mig ma mgon pa/ sa bya ba dang / rtamagrin zhes bya ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba
309b2(rgyud): dung 'argyal ba zhes byab // ma su gas rnam par rgyal banas pa 'dang /  nas bya ba dang / skams can zhes byab dang/ de srin pa'i khye ma'i gar rje srin mo bsnams sa na
309b3(rgyud): ba dang / sder mo nazhes bya ba dang / du bgrod ma zhes bya ba dang / gtun lung ma nas bya ba dang / gtum mo zhes bya ba dang / mda' bsnyems mnas kyang ba dang / sgra 'byin pa zhes bya ba dang / gsod ma zhes bya ba
309b4(rgyud): baspyod ma nas bye ba dang / rlung sbyin sa nas byab la sogs pa rdo na non nu'i 'khor rig 'dzin 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / ston pa'i ngo mtshar mad du
309b5(rgyud): tshe 'phrul gyis dang dbang med per 'khor du 'dus pa'i dbang phyug dang / dbang phyag ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa kun bran dang yang bran/ g.yog dang yang g.yog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs
309b6(rgyud): kho 'das pa rnams ni kla gzhan kyi shes pa'i d+had ni sems ma na pa dang / sras pa dang bang dang drag po dang dkrug pa dang bcing ba dgatang ba dang grol ba da nga chung ba dang mangs pad rdzogs pa dang mal
309b7(rgyud): dang bza' ba dang btung ba dang ba pa dang nyams pa dang gisad pa dang / gnon pa dang spar ba dang pham pa dang / sbal ba la sogs pa byed cing thabs gcig tu rdo rje lasang pa'i phral du lakhod do// de nas yang dpal
309b8(rgyud): sum kro d+hi'i rgyal mo yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i skul la dril te bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das byed pa'o rdo rje kun tu bzang po dang / btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu
310a1(rgyud): gnyis su med par mdun gyis bltas te bka' nadapa 'a tshul du gnas so// laphags pa d+mad tu shel rnams drag gil ba lol mdo zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang ba'o// 
310a2(rgyud): na na das gsang pa mchog gi bdag po dpal kun tu pa ring ba ma shes ma pa'i rnam mas khor gyi dkyil la tsha sems can pa rnam pa gtsigs so// byed kyikho thams cad
310a3(rgyud): gzigs nas kyi snod kyi khams nam mkha' dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang ridang / tshal la sogs pa thams cad la rnam par gzigs so// ded ga thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas yang
310a4(rgyud): da kyi khams sems dang sems las byung ba'i g.yo 'dang / 'dul ba dang / dmyal bdang / yi dgas dang / byom song dang / me dang / l+h+wa ma yin da/ 
310a5(rgyud): bzhi dang / tshad med pa 'anid/ gzugs med pa'i khams dang / sku glegs kyi khams dang / bdud chen cidang/ wa nga/ kru dang/ gnod sbyin dang / phrin pa dang / nam mkha rdzi dang / mi mchi
310a6(rgyud): / radza dang / ru tra can la sogs pa'i khams la rnam par gzigs so// de dag thams cad la rnam pa gzigs nas ya / nathos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' na
310a7(rgyud): kyis dang / rig 'dzin ma pa'i bsti gnas dang / phyogs bcu dus can 'i sangs rgyas thams cadas la rdzu phrul gyi spyan gyis rnama'ang ni gas nas smrabs ma las 'das pa de bzhin nyid stong pa
310a8(rgyud): 'oting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi mdzad/ rnam par mi mdzad/ mdzad pa mi 'gog/ mdzad pa rnam par yang mi 'gog/ mi mdzad pa yang mi gnas/ cang mi gsung / 
310b1(rgyud): dgas/ gsungs pa yang mi 'gog/ gsungs pa rnam par yang mi 'gog/ mi gsung mi 'gog pa la yang me gnas/ mtshang byed kyi 'khor dang / snod ma 'ams thams cad dang / sa khyad par thams cad
310b2(rgyud): pa yang mi gtsigs me dgongs/ gzigs gang dgangs pa mi mang mi 'gog/ rnam pa yang mi gog// mi 'gog ga pa yang miganas s+ho// denapa nyi na sa snyoms 'amazugs mthag tul ba byed
310b3(rgyud): de dag dang / snod kyi khams de dag dang / bcud kyi khams de dag dang / sa'i khyad par de dag thams cad kyang sgyumamamatshan nyid mam duyang du migs su med do// dper na nam pa badzin chos thams cad kyi rjes su
310b4(rgyud): so la ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang gdags su med pa de bzhin du don dam pa byang chub sems de yang chos thams cad la yang khyab la skabs ma las kyang 'das so// de ltar chos kyi spu'i ngo bor brjorjo du med pa la mnal bzhin
310b5(rgyud): / bum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa'i kr-i d+ha'i rgyal mos stong nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul lo// oM snang stong stong pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sku// skabs ma las 'das don dam byang chub sems// stong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i
310b6(rgyud): ga gis// snying rje nam mkha'i bo bstan du gsol// zhes bskul bas bsngal bar thugs su chud nas stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dang las rig pa'i ye shes snying rje chen po yis kun tu gleng bdal ba
310b7(rgyud): chen bdas la bya kyi las na rgyas pa par mdza da// lakhor gyid dkyil la ma khya'i par mdzad napa yang sdong kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzan sa myed bcud kyi khams kun la grub par ma
310b8(rgyud): bcud kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas sa'i khams kun la khyab par mdzad do// dper na nyi ma par snang
311a1(rgyud): cang dang cad bye kun la rnams pa khyab bdas to// dam chags ba mchog gi bdag pa de nyid yang teng de ledzin las langs nas snying du rnam mkha'i bo kun tu snang ba nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinapa
311a2(rgyud): snyoms pa zhugs so// thugs mchog tu snying rjes kun la grub par gyur pani ting de badzi de'i ma thu yin no// de nas yum kun tu ba'ang mo ngam pa mo de'i rgyal mos yang klu 'dis bskul lo// ma ltar byams
311a3(rgyud): thugs rjes kun tu khyab// mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul 'byung gnas las// longs spyod rdzogs dang thugs rje sprul pa'i sku// 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// a la la ho zhes
311a4(rgyud): gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad do na dam par byang chub semase la shar bar mkhyen nas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i mngon du byung ste/ 
311a5(rgyud): ra na zla ba drim med pa nam mkha' da la shar ba bzhin no// rdo rje'i sru mas rig pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'od cing rnam par 'phro ba ni dper na nyi 'od kyi 'od zer dus gcig shar blta bu'o// 
311a6(rgyud): 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des ting nge 'dzin las yangs nas 'dod chags chen po ma tshul rdo/ rnam par bskyengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs nas kyang yum kra d+hi'i
311a7(rgyud): la ma la gzigs te 'dus pa rnam par mang do// de nas yum grA d+hi'i rgyal mas cad snyan cim pag gi tshul gyis gzigs nas lan song du brkyang phyag btsal te g.yan pa sring ba'i klu 'dis rnam par
311a8(rgyud): sprul lo// e ma'i yid bzhin snga mchog tshogs chen mngon rdzogs lnga// rdo gar gyis tshul gyis gar mdzad cing // dgal mchog/ rdo rje'i byong chub sems chen de// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad ma'i
311b1(rgyud): gnas su bab to// ma ma'o dka la 'char ba'i byang chung sems spyan dang // chags pa dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du// gnyis med 'phros pa'i byin 'arlabs pas ma yas las// ye shes
311b2(rgyud): sa 'dzin// sa gsun pas ldongs pas dan kyis kyi// dkon gdung ba gnas nas kyang chub tu gu s+yA // nib la ga pa sa pas rnam par spyong // zhes rnam par bskul bas gnyis su me pa'i rnam ril pa
311b3(rgyud): zhing dzid pa dang bcas nas gar mdzad pa dang / zhal 'jam pa dang / mdor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 6kyang ba dang / spyan mdzes pa'i smin ring bskod cing skur ba dang / drang gapung bas g.yan pa spong ba dang / 'do deng
311b4(rgyud): bsrub pa dang / 'dog ci degs pa dang/ rnam pa cad pa'i rnal pa'i gang gyis rnam 'i 'i khams kun khyab par mang // rnam par la 'disa'i byang ba dang / bablang ba las thar ba thams cad la kha' par

311b6(rgyud): ma gtan pa dang / 'gog pa dang / sa'i khyad pa sems cad dang / byang chub kyi rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang / steg pa dang / stong pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / sdom pa dang / bsgrim pa dang / mnyes pa dang / gas

311b8(rgyud): dag pa'i mkha' klong nas rig pa byang chub kyi sems pa 'a per brjod kyi mi lang ba 'bam klas pa shang 'de las gsung gi yig 'bul khor po'i tshogs su yang sdang ngo // mig 'brud nyid dathugs phya
312a1(rgyud): mtshan bu ma kyar/ thugs das tshig gi phyag rgya 'a du thos shed rnam par 'dutsam tshul gyis rna pa byor gyi dbang phrag zhi 'khor rgyal ba lal yul dang / sems dpa' dang / sems mdang/ 
312a2(rgyud): / 'joms pa dang / 'joms marnams kyi sung yang ya rang gi dmachog gi phyag snga las snang bar byas te gas pa mtshig gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas nas rdo rdzogs pa' bral dul ba dang / ra
312a3(rgyud): la'ang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor na pas 'bring dang las pa 'byam klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa ldan gyis grub po// yang 'od zer de dag che las he drag mang tsa tshogs kyang shar to// 
312a4(rgyud): ka la yang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gi 'khoras so'i zhabs 'bri dang bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do// he ru kar ra las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par bab ste mun nag gi kong gsal bar bad do// chom
312a5(rgyud): klu dang ga dang / chos kyi char dang / mchod pa dang / chos kyi ngo mtshar rmad du blang ba dam pa'i cho 'phrul yan man dang snrel bzhi thams cad du ling long phyung ngo // de'i tshe he ru ka 'od kyi phreng ba des rba dra can dang / 
312a6(rgyud): 'a da / srin po dang / gad sbyin da/ dbang thugs nyi shurnabatud la migs par rang gi rgyal rab tu ston pa rnams ni ning dus g+ha ste/ yang ga dbang phyogs nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan
312a7(rgyud): 'di la dad par gyur nas 'dus rab tu 'dus so// de'i tshen byang chub sems kyi 'od zer kun tu zab pa des 'du shes med pa dang 'gog pa la gnas pa'i yur lhung ba rnams sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ba de

312b1(rgyud): ma sa skyes te las ma canaganas dang bcas kyi bstan pa di larab tud do// de nas 'dus pa'i latsha tshogs rnams ngom car phrang zad du byung tu 'dus nas shin tu skrag togasol ga lapa/ a ma

313a1(rgyud): brlabs pa'i phyir thugs gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub sems sman smras pas las kyil po ma rdon tu gram gcig lag tu bzhag ste/ las kyi dbang bsrur nas meng yang las kyi sems dpas

313a4(rgyud): bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor lo dang chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par cu gnyis kyi tshul du bskor te cho 'phrul 'di dag rnam par bstan te/ zhag khams mtha' dag kyang g.yos/ ra

314a1(rgyud): ba shad du med pa'i dod ni// rgyal ba rnams ma bshad de// de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang // rnam par brdung bar ma yang da // bka' mi sum par dgongs pa'o// 'dus pa'i 'khor

315b1(rgyud): nal don dam sa bden pa khong du chud par nus pa ni rin par skyes bu zhes grags so// smra ba seng ga byed pa po rdo kun tu bzang pos gsal pa/ com ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i rang can na gang lag

315b8(rgyud): stong ba las grub pa'i rtags dag snang mang ba ba rang bzhin med do// srog rgya zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba sbom gyis gdung pa 'i nga' du nyi ma dro ba las smig rgyal chur mthong yang de la chu'i
316a1(rgyud): de bzhin du gsang sngags mngag khyad par yang / dgas pa'i gzhi med pal med da tha skad btags pa yang ming nyid dmigs su ga la yod/ rmi lam zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid
316a2(rgyud): de sdug gi rnam pa mang po rmis kyang sangs nas ci yang dmigs su med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa yang ji ltar spyad na yang spyad pa'i dmigs pa kun dang bral lo// 
316a3(rgyud): zugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang chu'am me long ngam 'brum la brten nas bzhin gyis gzugs su snang bang bzhin de nyid du rol pa med do// de bzhin du gas dasngags kyi dngos grub kyang bsdu
316a4(rgyud): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yo byad la brten nas 'byung ma dmigs pa dang bral lo// dri ba'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bar snga ngan dri za gang na gnas pa deng grong khyer yang de na gnas te de blang ma thag
316a5(rgyud): pa ma yin pa dang / gsang sngags kyi gnas sa nal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskyed par 'gyul/ de yang bar zug pa yin no// brag ca zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni brag gi ngos la skung ska chen pa skad
316a6(rgyud): la yang de bzhin du 'byung ngo // 'byab yang smra mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa'i sgra yang bzlas patsam nyid na stong pa'o// chu zla nas bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni zla ba'i gzugs brtan chu
316a7(rgyud): sa yang tshul zla ba med do// de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil la khor la yang gzung ri kyi rtog pa med do// chu'i chu bur zhes pa pa'i mtshan nyid ni chu'i rlabs chen gcig las chu bur mang du 'thung zhid slar ya
316a8(rgyud): nga 'dzin gyi rnam pa yang gcig tu mdza // mig 'phrul 'das bya bar mtshan nyid ni me me gnad can gyis par snang la bltas na thab gnyis su sA pa yang bra ba la gnyis

316b2(rgyud): / thogs nas bskor na dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji ltar yang snang ste/ de la dbyibs med do// de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul cir yang snang zhing gru dngos por ma grub pa'o// sme pa re seng ge de lta

337b1(rgyud): nyes nyi shu lnga yi bar// mu la raka ta 'dzag pa la// rdo rje mtshon gyis ma phog pa// lcug phran pa yi rigs su 'ashad// sor mo gru ba ni sgra yab bam// smin tshogs che zhing mig kyang 'bur// 'gra ma glang ri

337b4(rgyud): la sogs pa// mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams na// mo yi rigs can gang yang rung // yid du 'ong dang mi 'od rnams// dngos grub bslab pa'i rten yin to// thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya'o//

344a1(rgyud): / reg pa mang pos bskor ba'o// nga migs sngags dang stangs tshul gyis//  dang pacwa ces rnam bsgrags na// khams gsum dregs pa thams cad kyang // dul phran bzhin du rlag par 'gyur// nas

350b3(rgyud): shA dulal 'gre de zhin te// sgoru pag bsam shing bcan//  kya shong du gnyis pa gzhag/ byang bas por rgya gams// srad kyi ma tshan nyid bkod nas su// dri chen 'bams dang // ragata dri phyogs
350b4(rgyud): phyogs su// de dag skabs su sbyang ba yi// bkro la dang du ra ka/ dza tipa pa khadri zhim// lce pog dkar po ma bzhin spar// 'di dag kyang ni rem pa bzhin// a ga ru dang gabur dang // gur kum par ma mig tu / 
350b5(rgyud): ro sa yan tshogs// rigs dang las dang 'dog gi so//  rigs mo sor dkyi 'bya// mthon lnga yis rnam par srungs// gsang chen de nyid dam pa la// rigs gcig rigs lnga rigs brgya yis/ 
350b6(rgyud): mchog bya ba yam// grol bu dag ni sbyangs ban// ral pa dang bsde dang bsdur dang gyi// lus dang bshag sa dang yon tan brjod// byin dag pa 'azlas pa rtags byang dang // baspu dang btag bcag gan pa 'a/ 
350b7(rgyud): mtshan ldan skad duHyis gdag// rigs dang mthun pa'i rig das kyis gi mas// dbang bsgyur byin 'drab tshul bzhin na// ting midzin mig yeng 'byings pa dang // dngas gli blang ba la sogs bya// 
350b8(rgyud): rilu'am 'degu'am// sgom la sogs ci rigs par// rnal 'byor mchog gis sprad par po// zhes gsungs so// der 'di ni tan bslab pa'i thabs so// gang yang rung ba'i sems can de// las
351a1(rgyud): yis// skub skyed pa shes skur smos te// rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med// ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni gaN bsgrub pa'i rabs so// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs mal// bsnyen pa sgrub

351a4(rgyud): la gnas pa dang // gsang sngags phyag rgya ma nyams dang // yo byad tshogs na nges par 'grub// mi ldan don rnams brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni mi 'grub pa
351a5(rgyud): rim pa mdzegs par// ngos na cing smra byed pa/  lag par gdon ming// zhe gsum 'o// de la 'din bsgrubs nas mgrub pa'i cha 'o// bda' 'azhin sa ba pa'i rnal 'byor pa/

351a7(rgyud): sa mi khyab ste// de dag la sogs pa lam yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam pa ma mnyam dang // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas la// brjod med brjod las 'das pa yin// dngos grub
351b1(rgyud): bad pa 'grub// ces gsums// phags pas kyi rgyam ya / sajam pa grags sa la mo'i mdo zhes bya ba las dang ma lda' bsu la' dam grangs pa shad pa'i le'u ste cu gnyis pa'o// na

351b3(rgyud): ga gi sdom pa ci'i phyir bsrung ba'o// sred gsum sems can thams cad la// log rtog 'dzul ba bsam mi kyab// de nyid gzhil ba'i gdul thabs su// phyi nang sdom pa'i snyed pa// rtog 'dul thabs su

351b8(rgyud): ma rtogs shing du su // dmatshag nyid cing rnam gi skye/ pa khyang par bzhin du// 'phrul pa'i khyad par de ltar gnas// dbas dam tshig zhes bya ga/ rang gi lta ba yin par masungs/ 
352a1(rgyud): gsungs so// dang 'di ni ma tshig gi mngon 'a 'o// gsang sngags rgyam tshan po 'i// dmatshig bsam las de skyed pa// rtsa ba yan lag gnyis su 'dus// 6ba'i mchag gsum
352a2(rgyud): yin te// srug sung thugs su N+Da la bas gsungs// yan lag dam tshig me spang dang // mi 'dod spyod dang shes pa dang // kub pa yin te rnam lnga // mdon rnam pa brgyad du grags// zhes gsungs
352a3(rgyud): de la 'di ni mngo rgyam pa'o// sku yi mtshig ces byag// bras spyan la gdung sems ldan// mang na dang bya sems sa pa yin// bram la yang rab gsum ste// dam tshig dbang dang shes rab nas/ 
352a4(rgyud): man ngag lung sngon slob dpon la// mngan dang dpya ba'i sems por na// lus ngag sgonas smos ci dgos// mgo dang mig dang gsang ma snying // rtag tu 'bral bar 'phangs pa war// bla ma
352a5(rgyud): // mi 'das sems kyi ya ltar// de mi phyi bzhin pa'u slar grang // de yi dgos pa ci yang dang // stong san srog lnga'ang mi ldan// khang cing gzhan su smos cing zhes// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po / 
352a6(rgyud): lul srog bskyed pa'i pham pas// shin tu mnyan zhing bkur bar bya// ci rtse dadabyings dang rnamathar gyi// sgo rnams de yis ston pa yin// dngos grub bye bragaji skad pa// dal rag las rjes su 'drang / 
352a7(rgyud): rig mun pas gtibs pa la// sems kyi smon ma de yis 'deg so// lA ma yongs kyi 'dran sun yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas zhal mthong yin// dge pa'i rtsa ba'i srog shing yin// yon tan kun
352a8(rgyud): gter mdzod yin// gal te yon tan ma ldan yang // tha mar bzung das spang byas na// kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pa yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas spur ba yin// de 'i nyam
352b1(rgyud): ldan pa 'bru mang // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams par dang // rgyam sras dang ni mthu chen rnams// phyag 'tsham mchod ci kun mi byed// 'jig rten 'din pa cuchen dus// de me dgongs pasnang ba dang // khu shang bran / 
352b2(rgyud): sa len na// rdo slob mas smos ci dgos// ni/ spyan la gdung sems kyang / 'dres dang ma 'dres yongs kyi sun// yang dag lam su zhugs pa la// mngan dang dpyas kyis sems tsam yang // rtag tu spang bar bya/

352b4(rgyud): thug par// mi 'bral 'grogs pa'i grogs mchog ste// mar me 'od dang sdong bu dra'o// dper na 'jig rten mi rnams kyang // mang po 'dul na dka' ba'i nga 'grub// de bzhin rdo rje ming sring spun// dngos grub

352b6(rgyud): sA las ma g.yos par// gzugs sngal na tshul du gas la// de nyid ngan las ma 'da' bar// logs pa spu yed mchog cel// rgyal ba rnams kyis rang tug sungs// gsung gidam tshig ces bya

356a3(rgyud): gang // gtus zung dus khye rgya zhugs kyis// reb med pa'i lal chen bya// rgya mcho ga ter kye 'argya thugs kyis// yid chub mi ldog brtan par bya// lugs pa lug gi sa 'argyal zhugs kyis/

356b1(rgyud): sa// sa zub 'khor dang ldan par bya// bcu gnyis dang ni gsu ma dgag// brtul zhugs blo dang ldan par bya// da la lags ta bsam ma khyag// tsa la gsungs so// 'phags pa rgyad cargyal pa ya shes rngas pa

356b3(rgyud): ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams pa 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ btsal med lun grub dkyil

356b6(rgyud): phyogs dang smad dang 'dug langs dang // tho baphur pa gtor ma dang // banas brjod tom dang bskal tshig dang // 'khor lo ma lha'i mtshan nyid dang // phul dang grub pa'i 'bras bus// bcu gnyis dang de gnyis

363a1(rgyud): // du/ pa gzhan don du// dbang mchog bskur ba 'gar ma yin// nam grangs so mtshan nyid ni// dang por dbye 'i dbang bcu bskur// de nas nang dbang bcu dang gcig/ de na pa sprub par bcu dang gsum// bam

363a3(rgyud): bzhi pa bkra shis bum pa'i dbang // lnga pa bkra shis rdzas kyi dbang // drug pa rin chen sna bdun dbang // bdun pa gdan mchog dam pa'i dbang // brgyad pa mdzes pa rgyan gyi dbang // dbu pa gsang ba ming gi da'ang // bcu
363a4(rgyud): rtsa nyags 'khor lo ste// byed ba bcu ba rdzogs pa dang // rdo na du gzhug par bya// dang migs ba nyan cing slob pa'i nga // gnyis pa lpags pa mthab mo gtad par bya// gsum pa rnang bzhi las
363a5(rgyud): rdzasan dkyir// bzhi pa rgyal 'tshab dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyin// lnga pa slob
363a6(rgyud): brnyan ga'ag/ rub sdug sum ye shes sbyin// tsub bkra shis dam rda ba dang // denas lags rje sbyi// bcud gcig gi sa na cug nas// byung pa'i dbang mchog smin par bya// dang por
363a7(rgyud): gtan cig sbyin// gnyis pa skyed rje'i dbang bskur smin// gsum pa yi ge 'khor lo sprin// bzhi pa ma cho sa shol 'bar ba sbyin// khan dgang ba sbyin dang wa// drug pa mtshon cha sna chags te// bdun pa smra
363a8(rgyud): dab zhing 'thug sa spyad/  sa lanag rgyad pe srem/ bdu drim ma skyen// gcig pa 'ad kyil longs spyod su'o// gnyis pa srub rdzas rab kyi skyed// gsum po
363b1(rgyud): se ng+geH// bcu dang gsum pa rdzogs pa dang // gabab dam pa snyan 'a yang // dkar dmar 'dres pa'i byang chub sems// ru mchog de'i lce la gzhag/ ska pa don dam byang chub sems// de'i phyir gzhag par bya// da
363b2(rgyud): pa'i rdzas rnams kyang // blortsal che ba'i bdag nyid dang // tsA ba la lus kyi sA ltas dang // ngo tshor che ba'i rdzas snyed dang // mchen ma pral mi ltas 'byung // thortsamache ba'i khyad par du// yang dag 'ded pa'i don rnams
363b3(rgyud): sdug dga' mgu su ra gyur// 'tsha pa'i chos la snyos yis kyang // rnam grangs chos la dang me 'gyug/ k+Shu snang ba'i mtshan ma thus// sbrum banan du shes par 'gyur// sa ra/

363b5(rgyud): gsal ba dang // bar snang dad la lding ba dang // shing ba la lta bub ya da// mul mi 'byed mom me tshig/ rlung gis khyer bar nus mi 'gyur// da la sogs te mamal yas mcho// dgra pa'i drung 'jo
363b6(rgyud): spru ba yin pa shes pa bya// dzam che dam pa yon tan ldan// me ci tsham ba dag tu gyu pa/ nyams pa sil sa da yang// rang mchog de lta skur ba 'din// de ga dus de rnam pa 'byung //

363b8(rgyud): la du// byas pas 'grub pa'angam ba nga// gas pa'i ngas la gnas kyangang// khang ya 'a ma marnams sam// e ning gdung bar bya ba'i phyir/ lam ngag gi brdarnams /

364a2(rgyud): par nyon// lus padang mtshig phyag rgya ni// lag pa g.yas pas bya ba kun// rnal 'byor pa yis bya ba'i brda// g.yon pas bya ba ma 'i bang// spyi bor gnyug pa'i lag brda ni// phya 'tshal ba yi bad yi rgya// dpral
364a3(rgyud): rag pa phyag la na min// lag pa g.yas pa 'am byas te// mgo'o brjed par byas pani// khams da mnas dri'i'i bang / lag pa g.yon pa rgya nas ni// g.yon du du da pa'i lan// mig gnyis
364a4(rgyud): la rig pa na// gzugs mengs ston cigaces pa'i 'ang // g.yas pa skyes pa mdzes pa yin// g.yon pa bud med pazang mong ba shad// nab dag la reg pa'i bar // gamen pa legs pa'i klu stan pang // g.yas

364a7(rgyud): dpan// bdag nyid dbyangs stan lan pa'i bar// snying gi'i dkyil du dag pa ni// don rtogs pa yi brjo ba shad// riganas phyir la 'gyed pa ni// spros pa'i ba du shes par bya// slar yang snyi gang gzugs
364a8(rgyud): ni/ sa bas ma nga yin no//  'i dkyil du ga pani/ 'tho ba yin// dbang po rab tugs la byas na// ting 'dzid sgrim zhes bya ba yin// brags gnyis ni ston pa'i
364b1(rgyud): pa 'gugs pa'i brda yin no// g.yon pa slar gtod pa yi bang // dpung pa gnyis la nyug pa'i brda// g.yas pa dregs pa 'dul ba'i brda// g.yon pa longs spyod grub pa'i bang // khu ku raka/ las bcangs dbang dusna
364b2(rgyud): pabacangs mthongs shig pa'o// brla gnyis blag pa'i ba dug kyang // g.yas pa chos la spyor ba'i bang // g.yon pa 'dod lags rtsom pa'i bang/ pus mo'i lha 'i ri brda dag cang // gdon pa rab tu 'du pa lan/ 
364b3(rgyud): bcing ba yin par bshad// g.yas pas rab tu dgrol ba yin// rkang pas gnon pa'i brda dog kyang // g.yon pas thams cad gnon par byed// g.yas pas 'joms par byed pa yin// mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i
364b4(rgyud): tshul gyis// kyo bo'i bar du shad pa yin// dbang pa rgyan du bsgre ba ni// de mdza' bar ded pa'i bang// chung ngu'i rtse mo bsgreng bde// daco sbyor bar 'dod pa'i brda// sngon po mngon par ston pa na// bkres shes
364b5(rgyud): 'i brda yin no// gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed pa'i brda// khro mo lcags kyur drangs byas na// de tshur shog bod yin no// de nyid zlog pa khyer cig pa'o// lag gnyis gang mkhas ba

365a3(rgyud): / 'byug yon can snang po yin// bran mo chod pa'i bad yin no// chu rom r+thas te// sran gyi mchog ne sha ye bang//  zhes bya ba'i ba// am mi nas bya ba'i bang // sun 'brum zhes pa ta yi nga/

375a7(rgyud): gras mnar med par lhung nas lnga la mthong ga sho la'i bar ba lnga brgyas rmos par gyu to// dbas na de zhin du shes par bya// yang smra ba'i seng gis gsol pa/ gang bag la la da
375a8(rgyud): sa shes rab kyi rnal 'byor du mdud par sla bos pa tsan kyis ga'ang spad 'dzel bur 'gyur ba lags/ gas ngas mchog gi bdag pas bka' stsal pa/ sgra phyir 'brang ba'i
375b1(rgyud): deni lo le'adu shes rdzob par 'gyuraro// dma'i ba yongs su shes shan/ sman ras 'dus dran pa ga
375b2(rgyud): la ma don pa ya/ na mam sangs shA gas so/ [] na pa
376a1(rgyud): rnams la bslabar gas so/  nas kyang ma los pa'i nga garnal byor pa rnams la lan gdags pan phyir nan tan bgyib bska' rags la/ de nas gsang ba mchog gis
376a2(rgyud): pos zhal 'dzug pa sa da de/ smin ring bsdung nas bdun mongs pa rba d+ha rgyal mam rnam par 'jug par gyur // dang chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i byang chubakhyer bzhin dugs
376a3(rgyud): par gyur te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo/ kun tu bzang pos btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do// 
376a4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das gas pa' mchog gi bdag pos smra ba'i seng gel bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng ge dngas chos 'di bsdus ta ba shad kyis nyon cig/ gsang 'a chen po'i rang
376a5(rgyud): bskyed pa med cing bslab pa med// bsgom pa med cing gzugs kyang med// phyag rgya med cing 'jug sgo'ang med// 'dod pa med cing bsru ba med// 'artul zhugs med cing bsrung ba'ang med/ 
376a6(rgyud): yengs rnam dag 'ardad med chos// skyon dang yod tan dbyings su ga/ ngam nyid ni brjod du med// de la gsal 'phrogams par byos// med pa'i don las kun 'byung ba// gsal
376a7(rgyud): gams pa bya ba'i phyir// sma ba sa pag khyod nyid kyis// mig don ma lus thams cad kun// shes rab blo lags la bsdum napa// mi nub rgyal mtshan rtsa mo ltar// nan tan
376b1(rgyud): ra can 'grus bya'o// nas gtad // de nas smra ba'is shes al la ho nam par bla rlung/ yad kyad kyil 'khar pad mo khu swa bya sta gsang pa 'don 'di nyid thugs ngan par la 'anas
376b2(rgyud): ste gsung gi dkyil 'khor du gnas so// de nas sma nga'i seng ges bcom ldan 'das gas pa mchog gi bdag po dang gsang ba'i mdo 'di nyid dang / 'dus pa le 'amar tshogs rnams la bstod
376b3(rgyud): pa klu 'di blangs so// me phyogs bcu dul pan rgyal ba'i sngags zhugs// gsang ba mchog shes bdag po/ g.yongs bye ter// gsang ga yum dang gnyis med rol pa'i chos num
376b4(rgyud): 2/ 'dul ba legs kya mi mthun gyi bdag po mchog// thams cad nga ldan gyi ston ma chog/ ses khyod pa phyag 'tshal 'byung // yobasam gyis ma khya chos kun 'dus pa'o
376b5(rgyud): lung dang rigs pa gtan tshigs kun gyi gnas// chud lung man ngag kun gyi 'byung gnas gso// phyi bas rnal 'byor kun gyi yid chas gter// gas papa'i yang gsang mdzad la
376b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod// mi phyogs bcu'i nang rnams kun napa 'dus // rgyal bsras bcas sum mchog sprul par bcas// nyid mas mi gzhan la khor du sku sprul pa/ 
376b7(rgyud): dbying pa kyi nga las mi 'ad dam tshig car// ni tshwa mang chog sa rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// hos las ta nas brjod pa sa 'ams cad mnyam par gyur to// de nam/ 
377a1(rgyud): sa ro// gas pam tshag ge nye das ni nyam pa ma gyi la ba mi gnas pa sa kyis rnam na
